etymology.description: 大 (big) + 栅栏 (fence) = historic business area
etymology.interpretation: Originally referring to a large fence, 大栅栏 evolved to name a bustling marketplace in Beijing known for its historic value and traditional shops.
etymology.simplification: 栅栏 was simplified from 柵欄 for easier writing and recognition.

examples.chinese: 大栅栏有很多老字号的店铺。
examples.pinyin: Dàshílàn yǒu hěn duō lǎozìhào de diànpù.
examples.english: Dazhalan has many time-honored brand stores.

examples.chinese: 游客们喜欢在大栅栏购物。
examples.english: Tourists like to shop at Dazhalan.

examples.chinese: 大栅栏位于北京市中心。
examples.english: Dazhalan is located in the center of Beijing.
